channel.title: PAK utility mod 0.3.1
channel.description:
hello yesterday I save while being in the airs with the pak mod except that my save crash here is the code display
> Version: 118201, IsPerforceBuild: false, BuildConfiguration: Shipping, NetMode: Standalone > > Assertion failed: (Index >= 0) & (Index < ArrayNum) [File:d:\ws\sb-200303103109-c8c\ue4\engine\source\runtime\core\public\Containers/Array.h] [Line: 611] Array index out of bounds: 0 from an array of size 0 > > FactoryGame_Win64_Shipping!FWindowsErrorOutputDevice::Serialize() [d:\ws\sb-200303103109-c8c\ue4\engine\source\runtime\core\private\windows\windowserroroutputdevice.cpp:79] > FactoryGame_Win64_Shipping!FOutputDevice::LogfImpl() [d:\ws\sb-200303103109-c8c\ue4\engine\source\runtime\core\private\misc\outputdevice.cpp:71] > FactoryGame_Win64_Shipping!AssertFailedImplV() [d:\ws\sb-200303103109-c8c\ue4\engine\source\runtime\core\private\misc\assertionmacros.cpp:101] > FactoryGame_Win64_Shipping!FDebug::CheckVerifyFailedImpl() [d:\ws\sb-200303103109-c8c\ue4\engine\source\runtime\core\private\misc\assertionmacros.cpp:439] > FactoryGame_Win64_Shipping!DispatchCheckVerify<void,<lambda_7c76834a4ebbcfe5aa8e9d189a8aa170> >() [d:\ws\sb-200303103109-c8c\ue4\engine\source\runtime\core\public\misc\assertionmacros.h:162] > FactoryGame_Win64_Shipping!AFGCircuitSubsystem::Tick() [d:\ws\sb-200303103109-c8c\ue4\games\factorygame\source\factorygame\private\fgcircuitsubsystem.cpp:200] > FactoryGame_Win64_Shipping!AActor::TickActor() [d:\ws\sb-200303103109-c8c\ue4\engine\source\runtime\engine\private\actor.cpp:1020] > FactoryGame_Win64_Shipping!FActorTickFunction::ExecuteTick() [d:\ws\sb-200303103109-c8c\ue4\engine\source\runtime\engine\private\actor.cpp:167] > FactoryGame_Win64_Shipping!FTickFunctionTask::DoTask() [d:\ws\sb-200303103109-c8c\ue4\engine\source\runtime\engine\private\ticktaskmanager.cpp:290] > FactoryGame_Win64_Shipping!TGraphTask<FTickFunctionTask>::ExecuteTask() [d:\ws\sb-200303103109-c8c\ue4\engine\source\runtime\core\public\async\taskgraphinterfaces.h:847] > FactoryGame_Win64_Shipping!FNamedTaskThread::ProcessTasksUntilQuit() [d:\ws\sb-200303103109-c8c\ue4\engine\source\runtime\core\private\async\taskgraph.cpp:581] > FactoryGame_Win64_Shipping!FTaskGraphImplementation::WaitUntilTasksComplete() [d:\ws\sb-200303103109-c8c\ue4\engine\source\runtime\core\private\async\taskgraph.cpp:1457] > FactoryGame_Win64_Shipping!FTickTaskSequencer::ReleaseTickGroup() [d:\ws\sb-200303103109-c8c\ue4\engine\source\runtime\engine\private\ticktaskmanager.cpp:561] > FactoryGame_Win64_Shipping!FTickTaskManager::RunTickGroup() [d:\ws\sb-200303103109-c8c\ue4\engine\source\runtime\engine\private\ticktaskmanager.cpp:1517] > FactoryGame_Win64_Shipping!UWorld::Tick() [d:\ws\sb-200303103109-c8c\ue4\engine\source\runtime\engine\private\leveltick.cpp:1568] > FactoryGame_Win64_Shipping!UGameEngine::Tick() [d:\ws\sb-200303103109-c8c\ue4\engine\source\runtime\engine\private\gameengine.cpp:1366] > FactoryGame_Win64_Shipping!UFGGameEngine::Tick() [d:\ws\sb-200303103109-c8c\ue4\games\factorygame\source\factorygame\private\fggameengine.cpp:9] > FactoryGame_Win64_Shipping!FEngineLoop::Tick() [d:\ws\sb-200303103109-c8c\ue4\engine\source\runtime\launch\private\launchengineloop.cpp:3976] > FactoryGame_Win64_Shipping!GuardedMain() [d:\ws\sb-200303103109-c8c\ue4\engine\source\runtime\launch\private\launch.cpp:168] > FactoryGame_Win64_Shipping!GuardedMainWrapper() [d:\ws\sb-200303103109-c8c\ue4\engine\source\runtime\launch\private\windows\launchwindows.cpp:145] > FactoryGame_Win64_Shipping!WinMain() [d:\ws\sb-200303103109-c8c\ue4\engine\source\runtime\launch\private\windows\launchwindows.cpp:275] > FactoryGame_Win64_Shipping!__scrt_common_main_seh() [d:\agent\_work\2\s\src\vctools\crt\vcstartup\src\startup\exe_common.inl:288] > kernel32 > ntdll

item.title: PAK utility mod 0.3.1
item.dc:creator: @isochronous Isochronous
item.description:
@isochronous wrote:

Was the pak utility mod the only mod you had installed?
